newsitem.title: FRANCE: TRAINER OF US SKI TEAM JAILED IN FRANCE.
newsitem.headline: TRAINER OF US SKI TEAM JAILED IN FRANCE.

text.p: A Swiss-born trainer of the U.S. national ski team, Ulrich Luthi, was sentenced to eight days in prison on Friday for assaulting and injuring a French police officer on an Alpine training slope last week.
Luthi was immediately taken from court to jail to begin his sentence.
The court was told he attacked an officer from a mountain rescue unit when the officer picked up a broken ski which a member of the U.S. team had lost during a fall.
Luthi told the court he did not mean to harm the police officer but only to recover the ski.
